cards.title: Curveshot
powers: Choose an effect, then apply it to a target.{BR}If any Effect you choose for this power does damage, that damage is irreducible, cannot be redirected, and damages targets that are immune to damage

flavorQuotes.text: Why is it so hard to believe?{BR}Legend can shoot lasers from his hands,{BR}lasers that [b]turn corners[/b].

cards.title: Splitshot
powers: Choose an effect, then apply it to up to 3 targets
cards.flavorText: He raised one hand, and a laser beam{BR}shot forth, splitting into eight smaller{BR}beams that bent in the air.

cards.title: Scattershot
powers: Choose an effect, then apply it to all targets except Legend

flavorQuotes.text: Restless but still around.{BR}Earth Zayin in the palm of his hand.{BR}He started to emerge, Legend faced him down.

cards.title: Fill the Sky
powers: Choose an effect, then apply it to any number of targets.{BR}Destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: Legend spread his arms,{BR}and hundreds of individual beams{BR}radiated out from his body.

activatableAbilities.name: effect
activatableAbilities.text: Legend deals 1 cold damage. Targets dealt damage in this way deal 1 less damage until the start of your next turn

flavorQuotes.text: I really don't want to{BR}go to the Birdcage
You've committed somewhere in the{BR}neighborhood of a hundred felonies,{BR}I don’t think you have many options.

cards.title: Kaleidoscope

activatableAbilities.name: effect
activatableAbilities.text: Select a damage type. Legend deals 2 damage of that type

cards.flavorText: A section of the street was torn{BR}free and flipped through the air.{BR}Legend blasted it out of existence{BR}with an indigo flash of light.

cards.title: Scatterblast

activatableAbilities.name: effect
activatableAbilities.text: Legend deals X energy damage, where X = 5 - the number of targets affected, minimum 1

cards.flavorText: Veteran member and leader of{BR}the Protectorate, his lasers carried as{BR}much firepower as a battalion of tanks.

cards.title: Burst
cards.body: This turn, when you would choose an Effect, instead choose any number of Effects
cards.flavorText: Legend became a blur within{BR}the field. Then, in a matter of two{BR}or three seconds, the entire space{BR}filled with a red light.

cards.title: Bounce Back
body: Whenever Legend takes damage place a Charge token on this card
Whenever Legend deals damage you may remove a Charge token from this card to increase the damage by 1
cards.flavorText: The whiplike tail struck Legend,{BR}and there was a firework display of light{BR}and sparks, Legend tumbling out of the{BR}sky, head over heels.

cards.title: Luminal
body: You may use an additional power this turn.
cards.flavorText: He'd absorbed light, heat and{BR}ambient radiation while he flew, and he{BR}felt restored. Even the mildest wear and{BR}tear had been tended to, his body{BR}restored to peak condition.

cards.title: Sky High
body: Legend and Legend's cards cannot be affected by Environment cards
cards.flavorText: He'd wondered sometimes if his ability{BR}to fly was meant for travel on{BR}an interstellar level.

cards.title: Precise Targeting
cards.body: Destroy an Ongoing or Environment card
cards.flavorText: The beams turned at right{BR}angles to strike Leviathan in precise{BR}areas, knocking his feet from under him,{BR}slamming him down into the road,{BR}catching him under the chin.

cards.title: Charisma
cards.body: Each player may either have one of their characters regain 2 HP or play a card

flavorQuotes.text: Capes!{BR}If you have faced an Endbringer before,{BR}[b]stand![/b]

cards.title: Breaker State
body: You may use an additional power each turn
Reduce damage dealt by Legend by 1
Reduce damage dealt to Legend by 1
At the start of your turn you may destroy this card. If you do, draw a card
cards.flavorText: A man who blazed with light{BR}stepped forward. He was a living bonfire,{BR}blue-white in color, with living etchings solid{BR}in the midst of it, white hot, a stylized mixture{BR}of flame and lightning in one shape,{BR}floating in the storm of energy.

cards.title: Barrage
cards.body: Legend deals 3 energy damage to all villain targets
cards.flavorText: If Alexandria was the flying{BR}bruiser that just about every other flying{BR}bruiser strove to match up to, then{BR}Legend was at the head of the pack when{BR}it came to being flying artillery.

cards.title: Energy Conversion
body: Whenever Legend is dealt damage by a villain or environment target, you may draw a card or play a card
cards.flavorText: He absorbed energy of a variety{BR}of kinds, including the kinetic energy{BR}that was transferred with a punch{BR}or with a bullet.

cards.title: Relativistic
cards.flavorText: Legend's flight powers let him{BR}accelerate to a speed that exceeded{BR}sound and continue accelerating,{BR}to no hard limit.
